divs: Sighting DetailsIN 1995, I WAS STANDING OUTSIDE AT THE TIME TALKING WITH FRIENDS, AND WE ALL SAW TWO LIGHTS IN THE NIGHT SKY, ASSUMED WHAT WE WERE LOOKING AT WERE 2 PLANES OR 2 HELICOPTERS FLYING SIDE BY SIDE...AS THE TWO LIGHT THAT WERE FLYING OVERHEAD GOT NEARER TO OUR POSITION, THEY SEEMED TO MERGE. I ASSUMED THEN THAT THE "PLANES" WERE THEN FLYING ONE IN FRONT OF ANOTHER, DIDNT GIVE IT MUCH THOUGHT. THEN THE "SINGLE" LIGHT IN THE SKY CHANGED TO A ORANGE RED, PULSED A FEW TIMES, THEN THE LIGHT FADED TO REVEAL A BRIGHT WHITE CIRCLE....THEN THE CIRCLE FADED AND IT WAS REPLACED BY A TRIANGLE, MOMENTS LATER THAT FADED AND WAS REPLACED BY A SQUARE...MOMENTS LATER THAT FADED AND WAS REPLACED BY AN ANIMATED ATOMIC ATOM SYMBOL SHOWING ELECTRONS IN ORBIT AROUND THE NUCLEUS OF AN ATOM....THEN THE PROCESS REPEATED ITSELF AGAIN...THIS HAPPENED 3 TIMES, AND THEN IT STOPPED...NOTHING FOLLOWED AFTER THAT...THE SPOT IN THE SKY VANISHED...WE ALL THAT WERE STANDING THERE WERE SPEECHLESS, AND DECIDED IT WAS BEST TO GO HOME AND NOT TALK ABOUT IT.
trends: There has been one other sighting in New Castle
There were no other sightings in New Castle on or around May 31st 1995
